posts.title: Atlanta
posts.text: Two cousins, with different views on art versus commerce, on their way up through the Atlanta rap scene; "Earnest 'Earn' Marks," an ambitious college drop-out and his estranged cousin, who suddenly becomes a star.

posts.title: Billions
posts.text: U.S. Attorney Chuck Rhoades goes after hedge fund king, Bobby "Axe" Axelrod in a battle between two powerful New York figures.

posts.title: Black Mirror
posts.text: A television anthology series that shows the dark side of life and technology.
